text: It's #WorldDownSyndromeDay, so here's a piece of reporting last year that I'm still really proud of. It's on the very high abortion rate after fetal diagnoses of Down syndrome, and the future as prenatal testing becomes easier and cheaper.

text: You know what really stands out in a roomful of Boomers and older people? The notifications! Sweet lord, the notifications. Rings and dings and alerts and keyboard clicks and camera shutters displaying the modern cellular telephone's sonic powers in all their majesty.
author: publicroad

text: At Beto O’Rourke meet and greet in Claremont, NH, an older man says he was going to support Beto but his son talked him out of it. Maybe in the ‘20s or ‘30s, the son suggested. O’Rourke smiles and tells the man to thank his son for believing he has a future.
author: publicroad
